# Lineare Regression im Detail

<!-- .pull-left[ -->

$$f_{x}=\alpha_{0}+\alpha_{1}x$$

$$\alpha_1=\frac{ {\sum_{i=1}^n}(x_i-\overline{x})(y_i-\overline{y}) } {\sum_{i=1}^n(x_i-\overline{x})^{2}}$$

$$\alpha_0=\overline{y}-\alpha_1\overline{x}$$
